* **Title (English)** : Accommodation in San Angelo, Texas (W0121-24JP17)

### Tender Description

The Department of Design for Government is seeking offers from Offerors to provide departmental accommodation that must be within 6 miles of the San Angelo Regional Airport – Mathis Field, Texas. The contract requirements are for a period commencing on January 31, 2024 and ending on February 26, 2024. Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by December 8, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. Any bid
